price: Sadarkaawwan Isa irraa ta’an, araaramaafi rahmataan (isaan caalchise). Raabbiin araaramaa, rahmata godhaa ta'eera.
arabic: دَرَجَٰتٖ مِّنۡهُ وَمَغۡفِرَةٗ وَرَحۡمَةٗۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمًا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: darajātin min'hu wamaghfiratan waraḥmatan wakāna al-lahu ghafūran raḥīman
